text: Meeuwen-Gruitrode is a former municipality in the Belgian province of Limburg. On 1 January 2019, Meeuwen-Gruitrode and Opglabbeek were merged into the new municipality of Oudsbergen. In 2007, 12611 people lived there. It is at 51° 05 North, 05° 31 East. ==References== Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Belgium)
title: Meeuwen-Gruitrode
